title: GridLayout
description: The layout of columns in a Grid Table row.

ColumnWidth.description: Array of fixed width of a column that you can specify.

ColumnWidthPercentage.description: Array of column width percentages in fractions of 1. A width percentage of -1 denotes auto-width, that is, it takes up all the remaining space. There can only be one -1 width item per section.

Spacing.description: The spacing between columns. For Android devices, this property is ignored.

DataSubscriptions.description: Array of data change events to subscribe to.
